DOC.brief_summary: The postprandial increase in MDA level following meat meal could cause modification to LDL particles in healthy volunteers. Co-consumption of food drived polyphenols with the meat will result in a significant decrease in LDL modification.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Meat and Food Drived Polyphenols on Oxidize LDL Level
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults, normal BMI Metabolic disorders Smokers Drinkers Taking nutritional supplement
